item.title: CVE-2020-7018|2024-08-04T09:18:02.921Z -- elastic -- elastic%20enterprise%20search
item.description: Elastic Enterprise Search before 7.9.0 contain a credential exposure flaw in the App Search interface. If a user is given the ï¿½developerï¿½ role, they will be able to view the administrator API credentials. These credentials could allow the developer user to conduct operations with the same permissions of the App Search administrator.
